statements: SELECT * FROM team_communication_log;
SELECT id, sender_id, recipient_id FROM team_communication_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, message FROM team_communication_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM team_communication_log ORDER BY sender_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_communication_log WHERE sender_id = 1 AND recipient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM team_communication_log WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM team_communication_log WHERE recipient_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sender_id, recipient_id FROM team_communication_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_communication_log WHERE sender_id = 3 AND recipient_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM team_communication_log;
SELECT * FROM communication_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, message FROM communication_log WHERE sender='Alice';
SELECT * FROM communication_log WHERE receiver='Bob' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT sender, message FROM communication_log WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_log ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_log WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND receiver = 'Bob';
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT sender, receiver, MAX(timestamp) AS last_communication FROM communication_log GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT name, role, department FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT id, name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM accountability_logs WHERE action = 'Completed' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communication_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM accountability_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_members.name, accountability_logs.action FROM team_members INNER JOIN accountability_logs ON team_members.id = accountability_logs.responsible_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, message_id, action_performed FROM message_logs WHERE action_performed = 'Deleted' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE member_id > 3 ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 5 AND receiver_id = 7;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE message_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT message_id, attachment_url FROM messages JOIN message_attachments ON messages.message_id = message_attachments.message_id;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT member_name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 2
SELECT topic, date, time FROM Meetings ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT assigner_id, assignee_id, task_description, deadline FROM TaskAssignments
SELECT member_id, member_name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT log_id, message, timestamp FROM CommunicationLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT topic, date, time, location FROM Meetings WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND location IS NOT NULL
SELECT m.topic, a.member_id, a.date FROM Meetings m INNER JOIN Attendance a ON m.meeting_id = a.meeting_id WHERE m.date = '2022-03-15'
SELECT task_id, assigner_id, assignee_id, task_description FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY deadline
